headline.main: PRESIDENT SPEEDS RUSSIAN SUPPLIES; Formally Invoking Lease-Lend Act, He Directs Stettinius to Expedite Transfers

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 7 -- President Roosevelt today instructed Edward R. Stettinius Jr., the Lease-Lend Administrator, to arrange "as quickly as possible" with Soviet officials the transfer of war supplies to Russia under the Lease-Lend Act.

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
